original_text: He shall come and strike the land of Egypt, giving over to the pestilence those who are doomed to the pestilence, to captivity those who are doomed to captivity, and to the sword those who are doomed to the sword.
korean_text: 그가 와서 애굽 땅을 치고 죽일 자는 죽이고 사로잡을 자는 사로잡고 칼로 칠 자는 칼로 칠 것이라

sentences.original_text: He shall come and strike the land of Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 와서 이집트 땅을 칠 것이다

sentences.original_text: giving over to the pestilence those who are doomed to the pestilence
to captivity those who are doomed to captivity
sentences.korean_translation: 포로될 운명지어진 자들을 포로 상태에 넘겨주며

sentences.original_text: and to the sword those who are doomed to the sword
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 칼에 운명지어진 자들을 칼에 넘겨줄 것이다
